CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 24, 1957, pg. A9, reads: "Scholarship Winners - Hershelle Sullivan, extreme right, presents the Gay Debs of Pittsburgh's scholarship awards to the winners at the club's dance last Friday at the Hotel Fort Pitt.  Left to right, seated: Patricia Morant, third-prize winner; Dorothy Gaddie, second; Barbara Brookins, first, and Miss Sullivan.  Back row: Lenora Ivey and Judy M. Loftin. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Patricia Morant, Dorothy Gaddie, Barbara Brookins and Hershelle Sullivan holding document, and Lenora Ivey and Judy M. Loftin (Davenport) in back, posed in front of Rookwood mural in Norse Room, Fort Pitt Hotel
